channel.title: Cooty Wars
channel.description:
Just select the client and start the script. [code]program New; var x,y:integer; begin
clickmouse(352,278,true) wait(2000) keydown(32) wait(10) keyup(32)
repeat if (findcolortolerance(x,y,52479,10,10,445,325, 10))then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if (findcolor(x,y,9816492,10,10,445,325,))then clickmouse(x,y,true)
if (findcolor(x,y,255,10,10,445,325))then clickmouse(x,y,true)
until(IsFKeyDown(8))
end.[/code]

item.title: Cooty Wars
item.dc:creator: @cycrosism cycrosism
item.description:
@cycrosism wrote:

His one has a shit load of errors, try this:

program New;
var
x,y:integer;
begin
clickmouse(352,278,true)
wait(2000)
keydown(32)
wait(10)
keyup(32)
repeat
if (findcolortolerance(x,y,52479,10,10,445,325, 10))then
clickmouse(x,y,true);
if (findcolor(x,y,9816492,10,10,445,325))then
clickmouse(x,y,true);
if (findcolor(x,y,255,10,10,445,325))then
clickmouse(x,y,true);
until(IsFKeyDown(8))
end.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2009, 03:34:17 am[/size][hr]I gave it a slight edit, Tell me if its better.

program New;

var
x,y:integer;

begin
clickmouse(352,278,true)
wait(2000)
keydown(32)
wait(10)
keyup(32)

repeat
repeat
until(findcolortolerance(x,y,52479,0,0,500,500,10))or (findcolor(x,y,9816492,0,0,500,500))or(findcolor(x,y,255,0,0,500,500))
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(200);
until(IsFKeyDown(8))
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Cooty Wars
item.dc:creator: @remoladen remoladen
item.description:
@remoladen wrote:

Just select the client and start the script.

[code]program New;
var
x,y:integer;
begin

clickmouse(352,278,true)
wait(2000)
keydown(32)
wait(10)
keyup(32)

repeat
if (findcolortolerance(x,y,52479,10,10,445,325, 10))then
clickmouse(x,y,true)

if (findcolor(x,y,9816492,10,10,445,325,))then
clickmouse(x,y,true)

if (findcolor(x,y,255,10,10,445,325))then
clickmouse(x,y,true)

until(IsFKeyDown(8))

end.[/code]
